document.full_text: general motors co  chief executive dan akerson said the company has not been greatly affected by supply disruptions due to the march earthquake in japan, and the company wants to repay u.s. taxpayers before making acquisitions or declaring a dividend.
document.title: gm ceo says no production disruptions due to japan
lines_and_colors: general motors co  chief executive dan akerson said the company has not been greatly affected by supply disruptions due to the march earthquake in japan, and the company wants to repay u.s. taxpayers before making acquisitions or declaring a dividend.
